attributes.action: I want to get motorcycling tests and lessons reopen to the public
attributes.additional_details: People have payed for tests like myself and they just keep getting cancelled it's not right nor fair there is people who are relying on getting their licence to help with mental health issues also like myself we have forked out the money for It which isn't cheap and we have nothing to show for that money something needs to be done
attributes.background: Motorcycle tests and lessons should be reopened because we are more than 2 metres apart plus have a helmet on and gloves you are on your own vehicle the hole time with a instructor who follows behind realistically it couldnt be any safer even if you tried

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558548
